website_summaries.verdict: These top-quality ingrown nail clippers give you a clean and uniform cut, ideal for thick or brittle nails.
pros: We love the rubber grip handle, which helps you stay comfortable, even with extended use
The powerful curved blades can tackle even the toughest of nails
cons: May feel too bulky in the hand for some

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and new (wrapped in sealed plastic), beautiful case, excellent toe nail clippers....
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that i've tried toe nail clippers and i have to say that these clippers are really sharp and work well. i have had problems with grown-in toe nails for years and having these sharp clippers helps me to be able to cut my toe nails without all the anxiety of hurting my big toe nail again. i made a video. Hopefully it's helpful. Sabiene :)
customer_reviews.author: Sabiene :)

customer_reviews.title: YOU BE THE JUDGE!
customer_reviews.text: AFTER THIRD USE A picture is worth a thousand words
customer_reviews.author: E. S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Clippers but Be Careful Using Them
customer_reviews.text: These clippers are very well made and strong. Even heavy nails are clipped easily. My only caution is that they are also very sharp so you need to be careful using them. I managed to clip off a portion of skin next to my one toenail which bled like crazy. It was my fault for not being more careful.
customer_reviews.author: Mark in FL

customer_reviews.title: They work well. You have to take small snips ...
customer_reviews.text: They work well. You have to take small snips on your toenails, and the clippers are sharp. But getting into tight corners of ingrown nails is much easier with these clippers than with conventional ones. Now I can be my own podiatrist (almost, anyway).
customer_reviews.author: Carl E. Frahme

customer_reviews.title: Nice & sharp, does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I had a big toenail that was very thick, too thick for ordinary clippers. These went through it like it was a sheet of paper.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thornhill

customer_reviews.title: Bezox Presicision toenail clippers
customer_reviews.text: Wow had not realized my old toenail clippers for my thick nail I have on each foot, were so dull. Got to be a tad more careful with these when I use them but was so easy to cut that one toe nail that's so thick. I'm just loving them so glad I went with the Red color as well. As well as it came in a very fancy box as well.
customer_reviews.author: Noreen M. Knutsen

customer_reviews.title: Best toe nail clippers I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: The last tool you buy is the most expensive - because you wasted money on many cheaper versions that just didn't work well. Cut to the chase, clip your frustrations, and get a decent, high quality nail clipper in the first place. Unlike many cheap clippers, this cuts straight, not in a curve which can lead to ingrown nails. (Ouch!) This comes in a fitted metal box with a formed plastic cover for the business end and comfortable rubber grips on the handle. Its a darn good addition to your personal hygiene kit.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Huge clippers. larger than expected. Also, I ...
customer_reviews.text: Huge clippers. larger than expected. Also, I always rinse off my nail tools after using them on my feet and these rusted after the second use.
customer_reviews.author: Wink

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic
customer_reviews.text: Initially good feel / function. Red comes off handles. Stains not only the shower shelf but your hands as well. Suggest - wait until this manufacturer has a better idea. The price is not appropriate for the defect noted.
customer_reviews.author: ebiidewallist

customer_reviews.title: Very Sharp - Be Careful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent clippers. They are very sharp and take a deeper cut than expected. Someone gave advice on this site that I recommend: Start out taking nips, don't try to take the whole cut until you have some experience with them.
customer_reviews.author: California Royer

customer_reviews.title: BEZOX Toenail Clippers
customer_reviews.text: First of all these clippers came in a nice little tin box to keep it in. I ordered the ones with the red handles. I have never even liked clippers I had in the past but I have to brag on these. I trimmed my toenails so quickly with no aggravation . They are strong, sharp and very attractive with the red handles. I liked them so much I ordered several more for gifts. I am more than satisfied with this order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably sharp
customer_reviews.text: You wanna use caution when using these as they are very sharp. Appears to be good quality since I have not dulled then out yet. Great for hard to reach angles. By advice is cut a little at a time cause it really takes off a lot. And it doesn’t break the nail but rather creates a fine cut so I can tell sharpness is not it’s weakness. Also the grip makes it nice to hold if you have wet hands. Which really helps prevent slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny M

customer_reviews.title: Yes, they do cut very well and accurate. ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, they do cut very well and accurate. As mentioned in other reviews, the clippers are very sharp and pointy. If your hand is steady, they work well when cutting and removing an ingrown nail. I filed down the sharp points just to be on the safe side and that did not seem to affect the performance of the clippers. I would have awarded five stars were it not for the sharp points.
customer_reviews.author: T. Taggart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Clippers
customer_reviews.text: Unlike a standard clipper, this toenail clopper get into nail areas that are hard to otherwise safely clip. They are extremely sharp and leave no doubt, once you carefully position them on a portion of the nail, that they will quickly and effectively cut what's desired. The sharpness makes for a very safe cut so there's no difficulty in cutting, again, the desired nail area.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Tackles toenails!
customer_reviews.text: EsI have arthritis and other health problems that make it difficult for me to use my old-fashioned nail clippers, plus can’t get to nail salon during COVID. These clippers solved my problems! Solid construction and very sharp blades make these a dream to use. In just a few well-placed snips the out-of-control nails were gone! Very easy to use. Padded handles made them easy to hold, too.
customer_reviews.author: Love2shop

customer_reviews.title: Best Toenail Clippers I ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased over the years toenail clippers that were advertised as being heavy duty. All of them failed to meet my needs. You see, I inherited toenails that are extremely thick, hard, and razor-sharp. I was pleasantly surprised when I opened my Bezox clippers. They were sturdy, well designed and cut through my toenails easily. I immediately contacted several family members who suffer from the same problem and shared my experience using the clippers. Problems solved!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy and well-balanced in the hand, strong, sharp. I like this best for trimming my pet’s claw-tips. The clipper is shaped in such a way that one can see well, so as not to injure the quick or splinter the claw, which hurts them. (Once hurt they will fight back) Excellent for humans too.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M.

customer_reviews.title: SHARP!
customer_reviews.text: These are great clippers. Extremely sharp. Cutting surface is quite wide and gently curved. If you need close in work, these may not be the best bet. If you are working with very thick nails, they cut through like butter, without the shattering and splitting that can occur.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Anne Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Found the clippers bulky and rather dangerous to use. I have been cutting my own nails for 70 years or more and found this no improvement over the old standard clippers or small scissors that I have. It appears of good quality but not functional for me. Not returning but will not use in the future or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Hood

customer_reviews.title: IT's heavy duty I found it hard to get my ingrown toenail out
customer_reviews.text: FOUND IT DIFFICULT MANEUVER, IT'S MADE VERY STURDY STILL HAVING A HARD TIME SEEING WHERE THE NAIL IS, I SUPPOSE I'M GONNA WAIT TILL IT GROWS LONGER, IT'S VERY PAINFUL, BEST WHEN IT HAS BEEN SOAKED WITH EBSON SALT, LESS PAINFUL
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, perfect for thick toenails!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for cutting thick toenails. It comes in a sturdy container for storage, it is easy to use and very sharp, best toenail clipper I have ever used! It is well made and easy to use. I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharper than a serpent's tooth
customer_reviews.text: These clippers are the dreadnaughts of toenail trimmers - you could fend off an cassowary attack with these babies! Plus they come in a handsome metal box (I love containers). Minus one star for the ergonomics - they still require some contortions to get exactly the right angle (but better than most).
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two months
customer_reviews.text: One of the jaws broke off after three uses cutting my nails. Contacted seller - no response. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: What I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: I needed the ability to cut nails from the side and these work great! Very sharp and the grip helps with precision in cutting. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: SUPER!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best clipper I've ever owned, and have owned many. VERY VERY sharp and precise cuts .. I struggle with ingrown toe nails, and was able to remove them easily and without pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Aitchison

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: These clippers are nice looking, effective, sharp and require very little strength to work. However, they are extremely sharp and the design doesn't really allow for effective control of the blade...cutting oneself is a high probability, I have found. Use them with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: SHARP
customer_reviews.text: SHARP.. These clippers are very sharp.. I thought the silicone handles would be awkward to hold but they turned out to be really comfortable and they don't slip in my hands like the ones without the covers do.. I'm very happy with these clippers and if needed I would buy again. Did I mention that they are SHARP..?
customer_reviews.author: Jake J.

customer_reviews.title: Careful, they're sharp!
customer_reviews.text: These clippers are really sharp. You could lose some skin with these if you're not careful. The shape and angle of the blades work well and simplifies the job. These are so much better than the standard style of clippers.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Edmiston

customer_reviews.title: Salon Class
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Hey a very clean cut that lady a long time before you have to cut again. Unlike the ordinary toenail clippers, you get a more professional cut.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bruster

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for months and they work great! Very sharp and soft handles.
customer_reviews.author: Marosgirl

customer_reviews.title: Not compact
customer_reviews.text: If these are the compact ones, I’d hate to see the standard size. A photo also couldn’t capture just how heavy and thick the blade is.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: EASE OF USE
customer_reviews.text: At first glance, these clippers seem bulky, but I was pleasantly surprised. They were light weight, the grip was easy to hold, and the cutting portion was smooth, not scary. I would have preferred a cloth container but that isn't a criticism. I can use them with the metal container.
customer_reviews.author: Niece T

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sharp, they need more of a curve to ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sharp, they need more of a curve to fit the nail. Be sure you have just toe nail in there or you will be bleeding. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Insurance Guy

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for clippers that were heavy duty like my podiatrist uses and these fit the bill. I like these because they are good for clipping diabetic toe nails which sometimes can be tough and thick so I'm able to keep nails trimmed between visits.
customer_reviews.author: DEBORAH ROZIER

customer_reviews.title: not as the image shown.
customer_reviews.text: these are standard side cutters not horizontal nippers the picture is misleading. the quality is very good but not what i thought i was getting when I ordered this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ray B.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp is the word
customer_reviews.text: These are very effective, and their sharpness and leverage are something to be greatly respected. Their curved jaws can be "in your favor," or a bit clumsy, if the curb is backwards from what you need on a particular nail.
customer_reviews.author: Tomcat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle safe clip can’t get too close to hurt yourself
customer_reviews.text: My husband wasn’t happy he couldn’t get the idea how to hold. Me? I love them as they open wide Does nice shape .
customer_reviews.author: SANDY FORST

customer_reviews.title: Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: At 83 my toes and toe nails are hard to trim. This product works nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged very nicely! They are very thick though and difficult to get under the nail if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Brown

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Sharp! be careful. Does the job of cutting thickened nails & that’s what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Joan

customer_reviews.title: Best Clippers I have
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several toenail clippers and these are by far the best. Super sharp and easy to use, I would recommend them to anyone looking for an easier way to care for toenails.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Lititz

customer_reviews.title: Very Sharp and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: handles make them easy to use. Sharp Points make them easy to fit in tight places.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: These will cut the toughst nails.
customer_reviews.text: My nails are thick and really tough to cut, so I had to have a podiatrist cut them. These clippers cut right through so I can trim my own nails, saving time and money.
customer_reviews.author: SWF28

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: While the tin the items was packaged in was dented, the item inside was undamaged. I have not found the clippers too sharp as some reviewers did; it seemed about right. Clippers had good grip and were easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris at Bigfork, MT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Clippers
customer_reviews.text: These clippers are the best. The cutter angle is just right, making the clippers easy to hold and clip your own nails. They are sharp, strong and cut without breaking the nail.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Enloe

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in the hopes that I could cut my thick toe nails. These are super heady duty and razor sharp. I have wire cutters that aren't this good.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard fungus nails!
customer_reviews.text: I love these clippers! I have hard fungus nails that had become impossible to cut wit regular nail clippers. No problem with these clippers. Just be careful because they are really sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Wow do these Work
customer_reviews.text: I thought I previously had a really high quality nail clipper set. When those broke, I purchased this one and I can barely believe how much easier it is to use than the expensive ones I purchased before. I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Galdor

customer_reviews.title: Too sharp to use
customer_reviews.text: The tip on these is needle sharp. It makes them too dangerous to use because it's nearly impossible to use these without poking yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Ron J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best podiatric clipper I've ever used! It's so sleek, strong & precise-- I can use it effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick toe nails, these clippers are very easy to use. Cut my toe nails very easy. They are very sharp, so be careful when you first start using. When you get use to the feel, the clippers are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Does a FINE Job!
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I have a thick toenail that conventional nail clippers are not useful. This one saved me a trip to a podiatrist and is a whole lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Sam

customer_reviews.title: Truly professional
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp blades with safety cover, sturdy construction, takes a minute to get used to the blade curve, but does any job done painlessly and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Vadim

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp,  easy to use clippers for excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: I love these nail clippers. Sharp as a razor so nice clean cuts, do not have to use much hand pressure, I appreciate the plastic blade cover and they came in a nice tin box which I repurposed to hold some small sewing items in.
customer_reviews.author: sewerbee

customer_reviews.title: Quality Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool, and it WILL cut you, so be careful. It takes a little time to get used to, but it really works well once you do.ej
customer_reviews.author: ej

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdily made and really work. I have some extremely difficult toenails and these do the job. As someone else noted -- use these to nibble away at the more difficult ones.
customer_reviews.author: gerb

customer_reviews.title: the quality of this item
customer_reviews.text: These are very sharp on thick toenails and work well

customer_reviews.title: Great toenail clippers
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for clippers that open enough for my thick toe nails. The Bezox clippers ended that search. They perform perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck32571

customer_reviews.title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction. Very sharp. I expect to get lots of use out of this product. The only flaw is that the blades weren't perfectly aligned wich caused a clicking sound when it clamped down. After a few uses, the clicking stopped, but it didn't seem quite as sharp as before. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: warren abbate

customer_reviews.title: they work good but you have to be careful because they are ...
customer_reviews.text: they work good but you have to be careful because they are sharp and will crack your nail if not careful so if you use theses after you purchase be careful there sharp but they do cut the nail with out hesitation
customer_reviews.author: kat ,toot

customer_reviews.title: Really sharp too
customer_reviews.text: I love these clippers. They are an excellent buy for the money!

customer_reviews.title: At last a sharp enough cutter for my thickening nails.
customer_reviews.text: This cutter is surgically sharp, be careful ! I had tried several other trimmers that just didn't perform. This one finally works. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: treehugger

customer_reviews.title: Be very careful when using.
customer_reviews.text: Must be very careful when using. I have cut myself and don’t use these clippers. Missed the deadline to return them.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Clippers
customer_reviews.text: My wife declares that these are the easiest to use nail clippers especially for tough toe nail people

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It is very sharp and strong. The grip is great for Arthiritic hands and to have full control(no slip). It cut through this nails like a charm.

customer_reviews.title: Very Please
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this tool, it made what was normally a difficult task, α task of ease!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to get these nail clippers! Even after reading the great reviews, I did not expect them to perform as well on my thick toenails. What a wonderful surprise! I used them right away and was so pleased! They are indeed sharp and the design is well suited to doing your nails yourself. I would recommend these to anyone!

customer_reviews.title: Very good for toenails and fingernails.  Sharp and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Great quality. Now I need a straight pair. These have a curved tip.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: This tool has an interesting shape and works great. Be careful-it's very sharp!

customer_reviews.title: I really like these clippers.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought many toenail clippers over the years and these are far above the best , especially when you get older and your toenails become thicker.

customer_reviews.title: They will cut

customer_reviews.title: Great for thick toenails!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for thick toenails! Best to use after soaking toenails in foot soak! Very happy!

customer_reviews.text: THE BEST TOE NAIL CLIPPER,........ BE CAREFUL IT IS VERY SHARP, BUT WORKS GREAT!!

customer_reviews.title: Clip with ease and confidence.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent clipper. I was able to trim my fungal toenail with ease. I had tried other clippers that simply did not work nevar of the thickness of the nail and the inferior quality of the clippers. Others were not string or sharp enough to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos DeJesus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for tough toenail problems
customer_reviews.text: I had thick ingrown toenails which regular pedicure instruments could not help. With these clippers I can get into the tightest nail spaces and fix the problem. I have the highest recommendation for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alana VanLuvender

customer_reviews.title: Quality Equipment I am Extremely HAPPY with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sharp narrow tip I spent hours going through the choices and decided on this piece of equipment and it turned out better than I expected.

customer_reviews.title: The best nail clippers

customer_reviews.title: These things will cut about anything!

product_meta.title: BEZOX Toenail Clippers, Nail Clippers for Thick Toenail and Ingrown Nails - Heavy Duty Toenail Nippers, Long handled Toe Nail Clipper - W/Metal Storage Box
feature_bullets: 【STRONG NAIL NIPPER】 Made from high quality and heavy duty stainless steel to built a sturdy architecture. This high quality toenail clipper is so powerful such that it is not only a favourite in most homes but also a common tool in most podiatry offices and salons.

【SMOOTH & PRECISE CUT】 Hand-sharpened and angled to a point the head cutting edge trims thick toenails or fingernails neatly and evenly without crushing the nail. The ergonomic architecture with a thick rubber handle fits perfect in your hand for precise clip and easy control when at work.

【FOR PROBLEM NAILS】 Our toenail cutter is an ideal tool for thick and brittle toenails caused by paronychia, nail fungus, damage or aging. Its super sharp blade and wide jaw opens up to 0.4 inch allowing you trim the hardest and thickest nails easily, even monster toenails found on diabetic feet didn’t stand a chance!

【HIGH QUALITY STEEL】 All metal part of our toenail cutter is made of 100% dermatologist grade surgical steel to allow safe sterilization, prevent corrosion and minimize risk of infections. Also, the professional grade stainless steel making it ideal for cutting through any type of toenails.
